column4: if I have XP then Windows 7 and put Ubuntu on same disk (empty partition) will it ruin XP or 7 ?

you can install it that way, which will use wubi and not be in the empty partition. you will need to boot a CD or USB stick. I also suggest you unpartition the space you want to install to so it is clear where the install will go
remember you can only have 4 primary partitions on a drive, so you may need to make an extended partition and then make logical partitions therin
